turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Ordering coffee from Starbucks. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A iced pumpkin spice chai latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It comes in venti iced, grande and tall.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take the tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the non-dairy options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut sounds good. I'll take coconut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So far, we have a tall, iced pumpkin spice chai latte with coconut milk. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like to pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm leaving for Starbucks right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You would like to put in the order now, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. An order for a tall, iced pumpkin spice chai latte with coconut milk has successfully been placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and have a great day!
